Text: Thanks a lot for this! It's people that share like you that's the reason why I put my rips up here as well! Thanks again! Good job keeping 5.1 - I would have downloaded Alice In Chains but I have the real DVD. :)

You lame fuckers lol - don't make the seeder send every packet to everyone. Up your upload bandwidth Jesus.

You're welcome, TorrentG0110.  I have done a lot of bloat reductions.  If anyone notices a good thing that is only available as a full DVD or something like that, let me know & I'll slim it down.
hey man can you do one in MKV format please

I avoid MKV because it is not as widely supported as AVI and I have found the MKV tools to be inferior to AVI tools.  It has a few advantages over AVI, but not enough to make me switch.  If you must have MKV, try renaming the file to .MKV  That will often work, as the internal codecs are very similar.
Great quality and thanks for reducing the size without killing the quality! Cheers bhobson333!!! :)
